seo.title: Slovakia Multi-Geo PWA Funnel: 47% ROI iGaming Case Study
seo.description: Learn how we achieved 47% ROI with multi-geo PWA funnel targeting Slovakia, Hungary, and Czech Republic. $20,052 spend generated ~246 FTDs on Facebook Ads.

hero.title: Slovakia - Multi-Geo PWA Funnel
hero.subtitle: How We Achieved 47% ROI with Strategic Multi-Geo Targeting

intro.description: In this case, we launched targeted traffic for iGaming offers in Slovakia using a PWA (Progressive Web App) funnel on Facebook Ads. By leveraging a multi-geo strategy, we tapped into cheaper audiences while maximizing payouts. The result? Solid 47% ROI from efficient scaling without burning through budgets. Here's how we did it, step by step.

multiGeo.title: Multi-Geo and Tracker Setup
multiGeo.description: To optimize costs and reach, we set up three streams in Keitaro tracker: one each for Slovakia, Hungary, and Czech Republic. This segmented distribution let us capture Slovak-speaking users across borders, securing lower CPCs and higher payouts from varied geo rates.
points: Customized three White Pages in PWA for each geo (Slovak, Hungarian, Czech) to warm up users with localized content.
Targeted Slovak language on Facebook, but expanded geo to multiple countries for cheaper traffic pools.

proTip.label: Pro Tip:
proTip.text: This approach diversifies riskâ€”if one geo underperforms, others pick up the slack with minimal extra spend.

iosTraffic.title: Handling iOS Traffic
iosTraffic.description: We fully embraced iOS traffic via our PWA Group setup, avoiding App Store redirects. iOS users installed the PWA directly to their home screen through Safari, complete with push subscriptions for re-engagement.

insight.label: Insight:
insight.text: iOS conversion held strong at an install-to-deposit ratio of 14:1, proving PWA's edge in processing Apple traffic seamlessly.

facebookCampaign.title: Facebook Campaign Configuration
points: Targeting: Males 25+, Slovak language speakers across Slovakia, Hungary, Czech Republic.
Ad Copy Strategy: Packed main text, headlines, and descriptions with high RTP mentions and the â‚¬1,200 + 220 FS bonus to hook users instantly.

creatives.title: Creatives and Moderation Tactics
creatives.description: We tested various formats rigorously, and static creatives outperformed videos in engagement and conversions for this audienceâ€”likely due to faster loading and simpler appeal in feed scrolling.
points: Uniquified all assets (images, videos, texts) via specialized bots to slip past moderation.
Added unique thumbnails to any video elements for quicker approvals.

optimization.title: Optimization and Daily Management
points: Culled ad sets with no clicks or CPCs exceeding $4-6.
Revived only those delivering deposits or cheap installs with regs.
Daily "garbage" audit: Retained effective sets, paused the rest.
During account freezes, we sat tightâ€”letting algorithms self-correct without interference.

strategy.title: Strategic Approach = Better Results
strategy.description: Every decision in this campaign was data-driven and strategically planned for maximum efficiency.

whyMultiGeo.title: Why Multi-Geo Delivered Wins
points: Cost Efficiency: Language targeting in less competitive countries slashed traffic prices.
Payout Boost: Varied CPA rates across geos meant higher overall earnings.
Resilience: Spread riskâ€”if Slovakia traffic spiked in cost, Hungary or Czech audiences compensated.

bonusInsight.label: Bonus Insight:
bonusInsight.text: With Slovakia's growing online gaming market (fueled by a tech-savvy population and EU regulations favoring iGaming), this setup capitalized on untapped cross-border demand, turning a standard launch into a 47% ROI machine.

roi.label: Return on Investment
roi.description: From $20,052 spend to ~246 FTDs at $120 payout â€” efficient scaling without burning budgets
